subject: Status of Current Tasks and Up coming tasks on listing platform
content: Sir, Below are the updates on current and upcoming tasks- Backend - Akshay is working Addition of Features and Specs from CRM. In the Next step, he will be working on integrating new car scope design at the Backend. - Manmohan Ji has finished the Lead add feature, Contactus API Modification Next step hw will be working on WhatsApp Notifications. - Rohan has Completed API creation for the Pricing model, he is working on Table to be added in DB to save Data and next step he will be working on Deployment. - Ragini and Anjali are Learning API Building in python. Frontend - Shradhanand is working on Carscope API integration, URL modifications, Model level UI insights customisation. Next Step he will work on New Carscope Design development and Blog UI and integration(Once the design of both is Finalised). - Danish is resolving some issues that came up in testing today, we plan to push the App for Release on coming Wednesday. - Anjali has completed Insights Graph UI, she will work on its API integration. Design - Carscope designs are in Review. Designs Sent for printing should be received by tomorrow. - Komal is working on Blog page UI. Server - The production Environment Setup is under process. - Python code deployment will be picked as next step. Credit Bearue integration - CRIF Need a more in-depth VAPT report, which is certified by CISA Auditor. I will connect with Abbas to get the exact requirements and will discuss the same with our auditor, have informed the auditor the same. I will share the draft of the roadmap for the next few months by tomorrow. Regards Prakhar Agrawal
